snippet: The jaded might contend that in a presidential election, one vote among tens of millions has no meaning. In Elyria, Ohio, voting is simply what you do.
abstract: Dan Barry This Land column examines strong sense of civic duty, and enthusiasm for voting, among residents of Elyria, Ohio.
lead_paragraph: The jaded might contend that in a presidential election, one vote among tens of millions has no meaning. In Elyria, Ohio, voting is simply what you do.

headline.print_headline: In a Small Ohio City, an Almost Sacred Day of Civic Purpose
headline.seo: In Elyria, Ohio, an Almost Sacred Day of Civic Purpose
headline.main: In a Small Ohio City, an Almost Sacred Day of Civic Purpose
